meanings.sent1: I took a pic of the sunset at the beach.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a pic of her family on her desk.
meanings.sent3: The pic of the cat wearing sunglasses made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The pic of the city skyline was a masterpiece of colors.
meanings.sent5: The pic of the waterfall was so clear, it felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: A brief written message or note.
meanings.sent1: Can you send me a pic with the details?
meanings.sent2: I left a pic on the fridge for you.
meanings.sent3: The pic on the sticky note reminded me of the meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a pic, short but full of meaning.
meanings.sent5: The pic on the memo was a reminder to call back.

meanings.sent1: I'll have a pic of the cake, please.
meanings.sent2: He offered me a pic of his sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The pic of cheese was the perfect snack.
meanings.sent4: The pic of chocolate melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The pic of the apple slice was refreshing.

meanings.sent1: The mountain's pic was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: The pic of the roof was the highest point.
meanings.sent3: The pic of the hilltop was a great spot for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The pic of the pyramid reached into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pic of the tree's top swayed in the wind.
